common.invalid-sender: 你只能在遊戲中執行這條指令。
common.no-permission: 你沒有權限執行這條指令。

brush.description: 打開 BlockSniper 圖形界面。
brush.need-item: You can only bind a brush to an item.
brush.bind-brush-item: You cannot bind the brush item
brush.clear-success: Successfully cleared all brushes from this item.
brush.not-bound: There was no brush bound to this item.

blocksniper.description: 顯示 BlockSniper 的相關信息，或重新加載插件。

redo.description: 恢復上一次 BlockSniper 撤銷的操作。
redo.no-redo: 沒有可以被恢復的操作。
redo.success: 成功恢復上一次撤銷的操作。

undo.description: 撤銷上一次 BlockSniper 的操作。
undo.no-undo: 沒有可以被撤銷的操作。

clone.description: 以指定格式克隆一個區域。

copy.success: 成功複製你看向的位置。

schematic.missing-name: 沒有為概要指定有效的名稱。

paste.description: 粘貼一個已克隆的區域到世界中。

copy.no-copies: 沒有可以被粘貼的複製樣本。
copy.success: 成功粘貼複製樣本至你看向的位置。

schematic.nonexistent: 無法在概要目錄中找到 %s 概要。
schematic.success: Pasting the schematic %s on the location looked at.

configuration-menu.title: BlockSniper 設置
configuration-menu.language: BlockSniper 相關信息使用的語言
configuration-menu.selection-item: Item ID of the item that is used to select
configuration-menu.min-async-size: 異步畫筆操作大小限制。如果畫筆大小高於這個數值，操作將被異步執行
configuration-menu.max-reverts: 撤銷/恢復操作最大保存數量。更早的操作將被自動清理
configuration-menu.reset-decrement-brush: 自動重置尺寸遞減至最初值
configuration-menu.save-brush: 服務器重啟時保存用戶畫筆數據
configuration-menu.session-timeout-time: The time in minutes after which the session of a player is removed after leaving the server
configuration-menu.auto-gui: 切換到畫筆物品欄時自動打開畫筆圖形界面
configuration-menu.cooldown: The cooldown in seconds (can be decimal) until the brush can be re-used after using it
configuration-menu.myplot-support: 是否啟用 MyPlot 支持

tree-menu.title: Tree Menu
tree-menu.trunk-height: The height of the trunk of the tree
tree-menu.trunk-width: The width of the tree at the bottom; The width decreases gradually upwards
tree-menu.max-branch-length: The maximum length one of the branches of the tree can extend
tree-menu.trunk-blocks: The blocks to use for the trunk of the tree
tree-menu.leaves-blocks: The blocks to use for the leaves of the tree
tree-menu.leaves-cluster-size: The size of the leaves cluster at the end of each branch

changelog.title: Changelog Menu
changelog.name: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Click a version to view its changelog.

language.auto-selected: No valid language has been selected. English has been auto selected.
language.usage: 請到遊戲中設置頁面使用 /b 選擇語言。

brush.restored: 玩家 %s 的畫筆已被恢復。

selection.error: Set your selection using the selection item before doing this action.
